title.narrative: 1.18 CHILDHOOD ILLNESS

description.narrative: Government and partners have capacity to scale up improved service delivery at community and facility level sanitation and hygiene especially for the most deprived communities, which contributes to Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Child Health, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 1: Mother and child survival, growth and development

participating-org.narrative: STATE HEALTH RESOUCE CENTRE CG REGD A C

sector.narrative: Child health policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government and partners have capacity to scale up improved service delivery at community and facility level sanitation and hygieneespecially for the most deprived communities

description.narrative: The Integrated Action Plan for Pneumonia and Diarrhoea was rolled out in 12 states with a strong focus on equity and convergence under government leadership; coverage improved for oral rehydration salts (from 26 percent to 51 percent) and zinc (from 0.3 percent to 20 percent) for childhood diarrhoea treatment. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of malaria endemic states that have adequate availability of Long Lasting Insecticide treated bed net (LLINs) to protect against malaria
Percentage of UNICEF supported HPDs that train at least 80 percent Accredited Social Health Activists (ASHAs) on pneumonia and diarrhoea management
Number of states that roll out India Action Plan for Pneumonia and Diarrheal (IAPPD)
Number of states linked to Paediatric Centre of Excellence (PCOEs) to implement quality paediatric HIV services
